message: Good day Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product. Given its value and value it will generate for you, I'm sure you'll find our asking price of $1400000 quite reasonable.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to both of us.
Hi Bob, I believe that the new price of $1200000 reflects the value and benefits that the product will bring to your operations. Looking forward to your positive response.

Hi Alice, I appreciate the reduction in price, but I still think we can find a better middle ground. I'm willing to increase my previous offer to $1000000, which I believe is a fair compromise considering the product's value to both of us.
Hi Bob,  I believe this revised price of $1100000 truly reflects the value and benefits of the product. I am confident that this price point addresses both our expectations suitably.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my previous offer and your current offer. I propose a price of $1050000, which I believe is a reasonable compromise.
